CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: JBDI Holdings has grown from a small reconditioning and recycling business to a comprehensive revitalization, Reconditioning and recycling of drums business comprising a diversified range of drums including open top drums, metal drums, plastic drums, plastic carboys and intermediate bulk containers. We have also, over the years, diversified into the business lines of the sale of new drums and the collection of waste drums and related products.
